title: Dangerous
overview: Revolves around the life of Aditya Dhanraj (Karan Singh Grover), a young struggling entrepreneur, who discovers that his wife Diya Dhanraj (Sonali Raut) has gone missing. He sets out to find his wife with the help of the police, only to discover that his ex-girlfriend Neha Singh (Bipasha Basu) will be handling his case. In pursuit of the truth, will they dig into many 'dangerous' hidden secrets like murder, kidnapping or even a case of business rivalry? Or is there something more to the case than meets the eye?
